localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Simple web-based game, best played over video call with friends! All players see a random word's category; all but one player (the liar) see the word. Take turns describing the word; at the end, collectively vote on who the liar is. ( https://github.com/fibanneacci/liar)
blogPost.body: Simple web-based game, best played over video call with friends! All players see a random word's category; all but one player (the liar) see the word. Take turns describing the word; at the end, collectively vote on who the liar is. ( https://github.com/fibanneacci/liar)
blogPost.title: who's the liar? - Play this simple web-based game with your friends!
blogPost.author: Anne Li

localize.description: 简单的网络游戏，最好和朋友通过视频通话来玩! 所有玩家看到一个随机词的类别；除了一个玩家（说谎者）外，所有玩家都看到这个词。轮流描述这个词；最后，集体投票决定谁是骗子。( https://github.com/fibanneacci/liar)
localize.tagline: 和你的朋友一起玩这个简单的网页游戏吧!

localize.description: 簡單的網絡遊戲，最好和朋友通過視頻通話來玩! 所有玩家看到一個隨機詞的類別；除了一個玩家（說謊者）外，所有玩家都看到這個詞。輪流描述這個詞；最後，集體投票決定誰是騙子。( https://github.com/fibanneacci/liar)
localize.tagline: 和你的朋友一起玩這個簡單的網頁遊戲吧!

next.excerpt: MakeMyFund enables investors to build and invest in their own fully personalized efunds - without being experts in capital markets. The idea is to deliver 3%-5% higher returns than conventional mutual funds - most of this based on lower cost and tax savings.
next.title: MakeMyFund - Personalized virtual equity fund

localize.description: MakeMyFund使投资者能够建立并投资于自己的完全个性化的电子基金--无需成为资本市场的专家。其理念是提供比传统共同基金高3%-5%的回报率--其中大部分是基于较低的成本和节税。
localize.tagline: 个性化的虚拟股票基金

localize.description: MakeMyFund使投資者能夠建立並投資於自己的完全個性化的電子基金--無需成爲資本市場的專家。其理念是提供比傳統共同基金高3%-5%的回報率--其中大部分是基於較低的成本和節稅。
localize.tagline: 個性化的虛擬股票基金
